bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Low-Voltage AC Power Circuit Breakers Used in Enclosures
ANSI/IEEE C37.13-1981
IEEE Standard for Low-Voltage AC Power Circuit Breakers Used in Enclosures - ANSI/IEEE C37.13-1981

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard covers enclosed low-voltage AC power circuit breakers, as follows: (1) stationary or draw-out type of two or three-pole construction, with one or more rated maximum voltages of 635 V (600 V for units incorporating fuses), 508 V, and 254 V for application on systems having nominal voltages of 600 V, 480 V, and 240 V. (2) unfused circuit breakers and fused circuit breakers (3) manually operated or power operated circuit breakers, with or without electromechanical or solid state trip devices.<>

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
